p: Both bark ( r = 0.54, P = 0.022) and sapwood ( r = 0.60, P = 0.009; Figure 4 ) lesion lengths were positively correlated with seedling mortality counts, while lesion depth was not. Bark and sapwood lesion length were not correlated with each other (Pearson correlation coefficient 0.92, P < 0.001). The depth and bark or sapwood lesion lengths were not correlated.
